item.title: CVE-2023-49161|2023-12-20T17:31:32.701Z -- guelben -- bravo%20translate
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Guelben Bravo Translate.This issue affects Bravo Translate: from n/a through 1.2.
